00050 /*@only@*/ char * stripTrailingChar(/*@only@*/ char * s, char c)
00051         /*@modifies *s */
00052 {
00053     char * t;
00054 /*@-boundswrite@*/
00055     for (t = s + strlen(s) - 1; *t == c && t >= s; t--)
00056         *t = '\0';
00057 /*@=boundswrite@*/
00058     return s;
00059 }
